name: Gnome
description: Gnomes are small humanoids known for their boundless curiosity and creativity. They remain fairly mysterious amongst the other peoples of the Viridus Nexus as they live underground and seldom leave their homes. They are natural inventors, blending magical and mechanical ingenuity to create new objects.

options.name: Small
options.description: Gnomes are small creatures. All of your finesse skills are upgraded and your physique skills downgraded. You also have a -1 penalty to movement speed.

options.name: Dual Synapses
options.description: Gnomes have a talent for focusing on spells and other complex tasks, gaining +1 skill with concentration. Additionally, Gnomes maintain their concentration while unconscious or sleeping.

options.name: Daily Action : Gnomish Touch
options.description: You touch an object and reveal any magical properties on it. When you identify an object in this way, you can also make an academics check to appraise it and determine the approximate value.

options.name: Fractured Minds
options.description: The gnomish mind is complex and intricate, causing you to be especially prone to mental anguish. You suffer a -3 penalty to psychic mitigation.
